targets.expr:
sum(max(kube_deployment_status_replicas_unavailable{deployment=~"$deployment_name",namespace=~"$deployment_namespace"}) without (instance, pod)) +
(sum(max(kube_statefulset_replicas{statefulset=~"$statefulset_name",namespace=~"$deployment_namespace"}) without (instance, pod)) - sum(min(kube_statefulset_status_replicas_ready{statefulset=~"$statefulset_name",namespace=~"$deployment_namespace"}) without (instance, pod)))
